sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for classic and skate ski today, February 27, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Due to the warm, rainy weather, trails have deteriorated and are not suitable for skiing.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks run still going strong. I recommend. Slushy and slow but holding up. The far lobe is deteriorating quickest but still full coverage as of 1:50 today. I say get it while you can!

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Skied Stony Creek late in the afternoon on Friday 2/21.  The Golf Course trails to the East of the parking lot was rolled and classic tracks groomed.  They generally groom early on Saturdays for weekend visitors.  Snow was equal to the best you will see in SE lower MI.  Did not ski the trails in the woods West of the parking lot.The park closes at 8:00 PM, so it might be possible to get in some night skiing.  Warmer temps and rain are coming.  Enjoy Stony Creek NOW>

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lovely blue sky Spring skiing on the Red and Blue loops today . Surprisingly little wind debris . The trail and groom is holding well.  The skate had a bit of suck : but I had rilled and LF 8 worked well.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open but soft this morning. Trails will not be groomed until the snow freezes. We still have a very good base of snow on the trails.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: The snow is soft this morning. It looks like the temperature should stay above freezing for the majority of the day. A drop in temperature is expected this evening. A significant snow event is predicted to hit our region starting tomorrow morning. Pintail Peak Lodge is open until 3:30 PM with a deli and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
